alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and northwestern Volusia Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pittman, or 9 miles northeast of Emeralda, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... DeLand, Pierson, Paisley, Lake George and Pittman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
